overview: Brian has been using social media and street teams to promote events and campaigns since the invention of facebook. Hailing from UC Davis, and working with innovative consumer tech startups + other innovative organizations, he’s always thinking “outside the box” and offers a fresh perspective to any person, client or team. As a newer addition to rno1, he’s now leveraging his social media acumen to spread the word about rno1, and to support our clients to strategize + launch social media campaigns that create maximum impact with an increased
